post.description:
Takes a set of user credentials and returns an access and refresh JSON web
token pair to prove the authentication of those credentials.

Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this Accessibility.

accessible_entrance.title: Accessible entrance
accessible_entrance.description: Indicates if the property has an accessible entrance.

elevator.title: Elevator
elevator.description: Indicates if the property is equipped with an elevator.

accessible_parking.title: Accessible parking
accessible_parking.description: Indicates if the property offers accessible parking spaces.

ramp.title: Ramp
ramp.description: Indicates if the property has a ramp for wheelchair access.

visual_aid.title: Visual aid
visual_aid.description: Indicates if visual aids like Braille are available at the property.

communication_accessibility.title: Communication accessibility
communication_accessibility.description: Indicates if communication aids like sign language interpreters or accessible formats are available.

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Whether the property has parking available.

pool.title: Pool
pool.description: Whether the property has a pool.

fitness_center.title: Fitness center
fitness_center.description: Whether the property has a fitness center.

tv.title: Tv
tv.description: Whether the property has TV available.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: Whether the property has a kitchen.

smoking_allowed.title: Smoking allowed
smoking_allowed.description: Whether smoking is allowed in the property.

party_allowed.title: Party allowed
party_allowed.description: Whether parties are allowed in the property.

security_cameras.title: Security cameras
security_cameras.description: Whether the property has security cameras.

date_available.title: Date available
date_available.description: Specific date for which the listing is available.

number_available.title: Number available
number_available.description: Number of identical units available (e.g., rooms, tickets).

time_start.title: Time start
time_start.description: Start time for the availability (useful for events and activities).

time_end.title: Time end
time_end.description: End time for the availability (useful for events and activities).

minimum_stay.title: Minimum stay
minimum_stay.description: Minimum number of nights/days required for booking (primarily for accommodations).

price_per_unit.title: Price per unit
price_per_unit.description: Price per unit for the duration of the stay or event.

listing.title: Listing
listing.description: Identifier for the listing to which this availability pertains.

check_in_date.title: Check in date
check_in_date.description: Date and time the guest will check in.

check_out_date.title: Check out date
check_out_date.description: Date and time the guest will check out.

special_requests.title: Special requests
special_requests.description: Any special requests made by the guest.

number_of_guests.title: Number of guests
number_of_guests.description: Number of guests included in the booking.

guest_id.title: Guest id
guest_id.description: The guest who made the booking.

low_sugar.title: Low sugar
low_sugar.description: Whether low sugar options are available

no_sugar_added.title: No sugar added
no_sugar_added.description: Whether options with no added sugar are available

other.title: Other
other.description: Free text field for other dietary requirements

smoke_detectors_installed.title: Smoke detectors installed
smoke_detectors_installed.description: Indicates if smoke detectors are installed in the property.

first_aid_kit_available.title: First aid kit available
first_aid_kit_available.description: Indicates if a first aid kit is available at the property.

fire_extinguisher_provided.title: Fire extinguisher provided
fire_extinguisher_provided.description: Indicates if a fire extinguisher is available for use.

emergency_contact_provided.title: Emergency contact provided
emergency_contact_provided.description: Indicates if emergency contact information is provided to guests.

regular_cleaning_protocols.title: Regular cleaning protocols
regular_cleaning_protocols.description: Indicates if the property undergoes regular cleaning protocols to maintain hygiene.

covid_19_precautions.title: Covid 19 precautions
covid_19_precautions.description: Indicates whether measures against Covid-19 are in place.

guests_capacity.title: Guests capacity
guests_capacity.description: The maximum number of guests the space can accommodate.

bathrooms.title: Bathrooms
bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms available in the space.

bedrooms.title: Bedrooms
bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms available in the space.

double_beds.title: Double beds
double_beds.description: Number of double beds available in the space.

single_beds.title: Single beds
single_beds.description: Number of single beds available in the space.

country.title: Country
country.description: Country where the listing is located.

city.title: City
city.description: City where the listing is located.

zip.title: Zip
zip.description: ZIP or postal code of the listing.

property_type.title: Property type
property_type.description: Type of property (e.g., Apartment, House, Cottage)

host.title: Host
host.description: The user who is listing the property.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The date and time the message was sent.

read_status.title: Read status
read_status.description: Indicates whether the message has been read by the receiver.

sender.title: Sender
sender.description: The user who sent the message.

receiver.title: Receiver
receiver.description: The user who received the message.

listing.title: Listing
listing.description: The property listing related to the message.

payment_date.title: Payment date
payment_date.description: Date and time when the payment was processed.

stripe_payment_id.title: Stripe payment id
stripe_payment_id.description: Stripe's unique identifier for the payment.

line_items.title: Line items
line_items.description: Detailed items that sum up to the total payment.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which the payment was made.

user_id.title: User id
user_id.description: Identifier for the user making the payment.

date_start.title: Date start
date_start.description: Start date and time for the activity

date_end.title: Date end
date_end.description: End date and time for the activity, same or later than date_start

retreat_type.title: Retreat type
retreat_type.description: Type of retreat (Yoga, Wellness, Spiritual, etc.)

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Overall theme or focus of the retreat

silence_policy.title: Silence policy
silence_policy.description: Rules regarding silence periods during the retreat

dietary_options.title: Dietary options
dietary_options.description: Structured dietary options available for participants

rating.title: Rating
rating.description: Rating given by the guest, from 1 (worst) to 5 (best).

review_text.title: Review text
review_text.description: Detailed textual feedback provided by the guest.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date and time the review was submitted.

guest.title: Guest
guest.description: The guest who submitted the review.

listing.title: Listing
listing.description: The listing to which the review pertains.

activity_type.title: Activity type
activity_type.description: Type of activity (outdoor, adventure, cultural, etc.)

guide_available.title: Guide available
guide_available.description: Whether the activity includes a professional guide

weather_dependent.title: Weather dependent
weather_dependent.description: Whether the activity is dependent on weather conditions

is_superuser.title: Superuser status
is_superuser.description: Designates that this user has all permissions without explicitly assigning them.

username.title: Username
username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

is_staff.title: Staff status
is_staff.description: Designates whether the user can log into this admin site.

is_active.title: Active
is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Unselect this instead of deleting accounts.

clerk_id.title: Clerk id
clerk_id.description: Unique identifier from Clerk for the user.

profile_picture.title: Profile picture
profile_picture.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

postal_code.title: Postal code
postal_code.description: Postal code of the user's address.

social_data.title: Social data
social_data.description: JSON containing social media profiles and other social data.

external_ids.title: External ids
external_ids.description: JSON containing IDs from external systems for the user.

phone_number.title: Phone number
phone_number.description: User's phone number in international format.

groups.description: The groups this user belongs to. A user will get all permissions granted to each of their groups.

items.description: The groups this user belongs to. A user will get all permissions granted to each of their groups.

added_on.title: Added on
added_on.description: The date and time when the listing was added to the wishlist.

user.title: User
user.description: The user who owns this wishlist.

listing.title: Listing
listing.description: The listing saved to the user's wishlist.

focus_area.title: Focus area
focus_area.description: Main theme or focus of the workshop

materials_provided.title: Materials provided
materials_provided.description: Whether materials needed for the workshop are provided
